params.prompt: Access your memory to see if there are any specific technologies, projects, or interests the user has previously mentioned. Then, conduct research to find the most important technical news from the **past 24 hours** in Golang, Python, Geospatial Engineering, AI/LLM, and any other topics found in memory. Use your **SearchWeb** tool with date-specific queries (e.g., 'Golang news Jan 31 2026') and check **RSS feeds** to ensure you only report on brand new developments. Do not report on old news. Generate a detailed, personalized daily briefing in Markdown format.
